Text:
Many Thanks for getting this posted.
The Video/Audio is 10/10 and you have my many thanks for such awesome quality

reliant1, I know you dislike Ep 18-19, but is there any way at all you can put them up.
Maybe as a separate torrent?
I really want to have the entire series and I dislike missing two episodes.
Espically such high quality videos as you have in your torrents.

Even if you don't like E18-19 wouldn't you consider uploading them for the good of the community?  Please bear in mind that many of us are collectors and although I personally (and many others from what I understand) really hate the final episode (22) our collections would simply not be complete without it.  

Also as a Trek-nerd I think you should know that the Dark Mirror theme has a long history in Trek.  There was an original series episode based on this, a Next Generation novel and a whole story arc involving 5 or 6 episodes in DS9.

Anyway it's better than nothing, thanks for sharing!

For those of you who want Episode 18 & 19 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5050713/Star_Trek_Enterprise_-_Season_4._HDTV_720p_x264_EP18-19_Only
reliant do you have other star trek tv series on hd like the next generation or voyager or the original series???? would like to have them all thanks bro you are the best
So I wonder what pitfa has uploaded 1.8gb of trash to me on this torrent......
hey reliant 1 thnx alot for this upload. seriously dude u rock. im just curious as to why you would omit episodes 18 and 19. not that im complaining. just curious is all.

@agent1su

Enterprise was the only series that was filmed and edited in high def. The other series (besides TOS) were all edited on video and not on film. They'd have to go back and re-do the effects for each episode. So there aren't any. =(

@reliant1

Oh, and thank you for the torrents! :)
